title: Philosopher in Contemplation
excerpt: Rembrandt’s Philosopher in Contemplation was painted in 1632 and spent its first hundred years in private collections in Flanders and the Netherlands.

title: Pleasures of the Ball
excerpt: Painted in 1632, famously relocated to Paris in the 18th century.
